downloadTitle: Schemas in BizTalk Server 2013 RosettaNet Accelerator (BTARN) – Converting DTD to XSD
downloadDescription: This page lists the technical documentation download that is available for BizTalk 2010　and 2013 Accelerator for Rosettanet.
detailsSection: RosettaNet Partner Interface Processes (PIPs) define business processes between trading partners in a supply chain. Microsoft BizTalk 2013 Accelerator for RosettaNet (BTARN) provides a set of PIPs out-of-the-box and you can create additional PIPs.  RosettaNet specifies all PIP message schemas in the form of Document Type Definitions (DTDs).  However, BTARN implements these DTDs as XML Schema Definition files (XSDs), because Microsoft BizTalk Server 2013 represents documents by using XSDs, not DTDs. This document outlines the steps to convert any RosettaNet PIP’s DTD into an XSD
installInstructionSection:
1. Click the Download button on this page to start the download
  2. Where you see a company or publisher listed in a security message, make sure the company name is Microsoft Corporation, and then click Continue, or Allow.
